newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Wienerberger, Koramic buy Boral unit.
newsitem.headline: Wienerberger, Koramic buy Boral unit.

text.p: Austrian brickmaker Wienerberger Baustoffindustrie AG said on Friday it and Belgian partner Koramic had acquired Boral Dach-Produkte GmbH, the German unit of Australia's Boral group.

In a statement, Wienerberger said German-based Koramic-Wienerberger Dachprodukte GmbH would take over three roof tile works in Langenzenn, Riesa and Langburkersdorf on January 1, pending the approval of German cartel authorities.
It gave no financial details of the deal.
Wienerberger said its acquisition had a turnover of 50 million marks ($32.1 million) in 1996 and forecast it would post a profit in 1997.

It said Sydney-based Boral would withdraw from the German roofing market, where it had neither achieved a prominent market position nor significant success. -- Vienna Newsroom, 43-1-53112-258 ($ = 1.557 German Marks)
